job.title: Senior C# Web Developer
job.description:
JOB HIGHLIGHTS

Flexible Working Hours. We will be following core hours from 6:00 PM to 10:00 PM (PH Time)
Fully Remote
Good working environment and work-life balance
1 PTO every month after regularization
8 hrs shift

COMPANY SUMMARY:
AJ Tickets has changed how the world connects with its favorite artists, teams, and shows, and we continue to shape innovation daily. We're not just selling tickets; we're enriching lives one amazing experience at a time.

POSITION SUMMARY:
We are seeking a talented and experienced software engineer to join our global team. Your main target is to deliver an excellent, innovative SAAS solution that contains complex yet user-friendly and intuitive functionalities. This user experience goes from scoping to application support. In our technology, we use many frameworks and technologies such as .Net, Angular, Azure, Redis, Puppeteer, SignalR, and others.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
Your main responsibility is to develop software solutions (new, adapted, and extended) to make sure the software products meet the business and functional requirements.
Hereby, take ownership from design, over implementation to testing, and make sure the solutions are aligned with the technology vision, strategy, and architecture.
Participate in scoping discussions and collaborate with stakeholders (and teammates) to understand the business requirements.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to resolve technical issues within or between teams, ensuring smooth coordination and efficient project delivery

CANDIDATE QUALIFICATIONS
The Essentials
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree required in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
A minimum of 5 years of experience as a Full Stack Software Engineer or in a similar role.
At least 5 years of proven expertise in C# and related technologies, with a deep understanding of C# principles, architecture, and services.
A minimum of 3 years of experience with front-end technologies like Angular (10 or later).
A minimum of 3 years of experience with other front-end technologies like TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS, and CSS Media Queries.
Proficiency in SQL Server Database management.
At least 2 years of experience with Azure and its resources.
Additional Successful Qualifications
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and address complex technical challenges.
Ability to review and provide constructive feedback.
Proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions within deadlines.
A positive, proactive, and collaborative approach to working in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.

If you are interested in the opportunity and have the required years of experience, please send an updated resume.

questions.question: How many years of experience do you have with C#? Can you tell me what you know about C# and how to use it?
How many years of experience do you have with Angular? What is the current version of Angular that you are using? What are the directives, components, and modules?
How many years of experience do you have with Azure? Can you tell me what you know about Azure and how to use it?
How many years of experience do you have in Javascript? Can you explain how the asynchronous function works in JavaScript?
How many years of experience do you have in .NET? When was the last time you developed an application and what was it?

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a highly skilled Senior C# Web Developer to join our team for a project that is expected to last more than 6 months. The ideal candidate should have strong experience in TypeScript, MySQL, ASP.NET, Full-Stack Development, JavaScript, Angular, and of course, C#. 

As a Senior C# Web Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications using C# and ASP.NET. You will work closely with the team to design, develop, and implement new features and functionalities. 

To be considered for this position, please submit a proposal describing how you can help with the project. Please include details of your relevant experience, including links to past completed projects that demonstrate your expertise in C# web development. We are looking for candidates who can hit the ground running and contribute to the success of the project from day one.
